alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward; Maui Leeward West (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 23 at 3:06AM HST until January 23 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI...NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI...AND WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND LANAI... .A powerful northwest (320 degrees) swell will produce extra large surf today. Wave runup and coastal overwash may occur along north and west facing shorelines, especially during the early morning high tide. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf of 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of Maui and Lanai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
